reviews.review: legalzinho

Recent patch has made the new player experience a horror show by tilting all the power to the killer role in this asymmetric horror game.  Unless you are supremely skilled and playing with 3 friends as survivor you will face a tremendous uphill battle to survive long enough to learn how to play the game.

Don't play this game.
One of the best multiplayer games you'll love to hate.

I used to love this game, but I honestly can't recommend it anymore. Devs wanted to "shake up" the Meta with the recent large update, but in doing so made the game nigh on unplayable for half the community. The Devs count on Killer Mains playing nicely, (aka not tunneling, camping etc) to combat how extremely buffed they were, which just doesn't happen and has only made things worse since. It's just.... sad, to see how hard this game has fallen. Rest In Peace.

They ruined the game with recent updates, too many killers with too many different perks, the one who hits you from distance, the one who always finds you wherever you are in the map...the core of the game has been lost, no more hiding, searching, chasing and melee slashing; killers are gods which spot you in 0.3 secs after the game begins...now it's more like playing a football match without goalkeepers.

With the latest update they have transformed the game into a pro player product, toxic and with even more frustrating mechanics that does not fit at all for those who just want to have a few hours in peace

This game is NOT casual or beginner friendly.

I really love the concept of this game, however it is plagued with such over-powered killers and abilities which make the survivor experience terrible. Now you may scoff and think I'm just plain bad at the game, which could be the case, however I make sure to do generators and help team mates as much as I can.

The only people who find it easy as a survivor are the sweats and pros on YouTube or Twitch who the developers only cater towards in terms of gameplay features. Make the game suitable for casual audiences, it's just riddled with OP killers. The fact you can't stun (besides a pallet or flashlight) makes your chases a boring experience because 9/10 you are dead.

Instead you have to loop around building and pallets, 360 trick and other stuff to lengthen your chase and have a chance to escape. Which is annoying as it isn't a tip you learn in-game. On top of that you have to memorise maps, memorise pallet placements, memorise survivor perks, memorise killer perks, memorise the offerings and what they do in game, memorise add-ons to the object loadouts.

Too much memorisation for a horror game! And there is no compass on screen so if I play with my friends, I can't be specific in my call outs.

Another gripe I have with this game are the over-powered killers. Like the killers are objectively over-powered; couple that with the perks which make them more OP, it just makes the game so boring and suck the fun away if they have all of these perks which are objectively OP. The killer gets to swing when hitting so dodging means nothing, the scratch marks last way too long (10 seconds is a long time in a game) and there are killer with ranged attacks when even if you attempt to avoid, are so very hard to avoid, and so you enter an injured state.

Yeah maybe the pro player or sweat can easily dodge killers, but I am a casual gamer and it isn't fun for me and my friends who play this game from time to time, casually.

Oh yeah, and hit box issues, where the killers still hit me when im 0.1 seconds into the run animation, EVEN AFTER I VAULT. And another thing, killers speed is way too fast, wiggle takes so long that it's pointless to even attempt to wiggle out because hooks are way too close to each other and even if you sabotage a hook, it comes back after 30 seconds, like that is not enough time when you need to heal and do generators. At least make that 1 minute long

Also, when you are downed and are recovering, you cant get up on your own, you have to find someone to fill in the 5% of the bar left. Great. With a game with no in-game comms, whats the point of that feature? Honestly, like a hex totem is useless, unless it is an actual hex totem. Then when you cleanse the hex totem, you get exposed. Like what is the point of cleansing a totem if I get exposed?

This game DESPERATELY NEEDS to be more casual friendly. Like that is the main thing which is hindering the game's fun and excitement.

Please address this Behaviour Interactive! I really enjoy the games' concept and style but I can't enjoy it if casuals are penalised for being casuals.

Só não joga quem tem medo de terror. Pra quem já assistiu filmes de terror e gosta sempre de dar palpite no que o personagem poderia ter feito pra escapar, essa será uma excelente opção para testar esses palpites na prática. Have fun !

DBD is one of those games where you don't really understand what you're supposed to do, until you suddenly do. It's got that moment to moment gameplay that, at first, might be discouraging to pursue, but after a while, you realize that this aforementioned moment to moment gameplay turns into a constant, the more time you invest into it. It has a very special flavor, something that the likes of most semi-competitive multiplayer games don't really have nowadays, and it keeps getting better and better. Furthermore, with the constant and steady addition of new characters - either on the Killer or Survivor side - and new content, it retains its place at the top of its game, no pun intended. 

Jokes aside, solid game, good fun, nice rewarding yet challenging experience, will continue playing for sure

目前版本没有任何平衡性，屠夫萌新都可以4杀，老手人类2000小时跑不出去。屠夫打法单一，没有博弈，守尸流简简单单4杀，人类天天想着疲劳技能怎么配，屠夫技能搭配针对修机或者针对治疗，都可以让人类痛苦面具。大局观上说，开局秒倒怪，屠夫直接守到死，后面直接3个人开3~4台机的情况，屠夫都能杀3~4个人，如果，遇到老手玩家，亮了2~3台机，屠夫只需要选择守3连，就可以扭转局面。守的收益提高了，导致玩家体验变差。再说说，屠夫追人方面，屠夫技能的增强，导致现在屠夫不跟你博弈，人类跳窗，屠夫跳窗，人类砸板，屠夫挨一下踢板也追的上，人类转点困难，体验很差。我不知道，后续版本是为了新人类新屠夫做铺垫，还是这个版本就这么下去，那么真的会导致玩家流逝加大了。各位好友感谢一路的陪伴，且玩且珍惜。

キラーがある程度の実力と遅延パークを手にし、そしてトンネル＆キャンプするだけで勝てるクソゲー。
キラーの能力の調整も毎回良くも悪くもやり過ぎだし、
パークの調整も使えるものが使えなくなり、使えないものが使えるようになるを繰り返すだけ。
要するに両極端でやりすぎ。
パークの発動条件が複雑かつ状況を選びすぎるものにし過ぎた結果
実用性が低く結局選択肢に入らないパークばかり。よって誤差はあれど鉄板構成ばかりになる。
特にベテランが操るナース戦はもはやサバイバーの実力など関係ない時間の無駄でしかないクソゲー。
２ブリンクできるようになる時間を延ばすか、２ブリンク以降はダッシュ攻撃無しにするべき。

もう６年も開発しているのに未だに過去の失敗から学ぶということが出来ない無能運営と
相手の気持ちなど関係なく自分が楽しめればそれでいいという人格破綻者共によって
破壊された良ゲー。
